original: Almerstam, Sten Filip GlHis, komminister, Fårhult, f. 21/4/09’ i^ Linköp. G, 42 m. folksk :lär :an Ingrid Hult-berg. — Stud:ex. i Linköp. 29, teol. fil. ex. 31, t€ol. kand., prakt. teol. prov o. prästv. f. Linköp. stift 34. Past:adj. i Norrköpings Östra Eneby 35-38, kommin. i Gladhammar sed. 38. Ordf. i ’skolstyr., kyrkofullm. o. pastoratsstämma.
translated: Almerstam, Sten Filip GlHis, minister, Fårhult, born 21/4/09 in Linköping. Married to Ingrid Hultberg, a primary school teacher, in 1942. He graduated from high school in Linköping in 1929, completed a degree in theology in 1931, and received a practical theological certification and was ordained as a priest for the Linköping diocese in 1934. He served as an assistant pastor in Norrköpings Östra Eneby from 1935 to 1938, and as a minister in Gladhammar since 1938. He also served as chairman of the school committee, church assembly, and parish meeting.
